sys_script_include.name: SelfReport

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_1332a25ccb220210e9ab17d1fbe5c5c2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1434439_my_tem_0.SelfReport</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SelfReport</name><script><![CDATA[var SelfReport = Class.create();
SelfReport.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    isOpen: function(current) {
        if (current.state != "Requested") {
            return false;
        }
		var selfGR = new GlideRecord("x_1434439_my_tem_0_status_report");
        selfGR.addQuery("sys_id", current.self_report);
        selfGR.addQuery("status", "IN", "submitted, at_risk, status_requested");
        selfGR.query();
        if (selfGR.next()) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    },
    isOpenForStatusRequest: function(current) {
        var selfGR = new GlideRecord("x_1434439_my_tem_0_status_report");
        selfGR.addQuery("sys_id", current.self_report);
        selfGR.addQuery("status", "IN", "submitted, at_risk");
        selfGR.query();
        if (selfGR.next()) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    },
    type: 'SelfReport'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>1332a25ccb220210e9ab17d1fbe5c5c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SelfReport</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1332a25ccb220210e9ab17d1fbe5c5c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
